tags.name: select-root
tags.description: A custom select element that provides a dropdown list of options. It follows the native select element behavior with enhanced styling and keyboard navigation support.

attributes.name: x-value
attributes.description: The currently selected value. Maps to the x-value attribute of the selected item.

attributes.name: x-disabled
attributes.description: When present, indicates that the select is not interactive.

attributes.name: x-open
attributes.description: When present, indicates that the select dropdown is open.

attributes.name: x-name
attributes.description: Optional. The name to include in the select event

tags.name: select-trigger
tags.description: The button that triggers the select dropdown. Shows the currently selected value.

attributes.name: tabindex
attributes.description: The tab order of the trigger button. Defaults to 0.

tags.name: select-item
tags.description: An option in the select dropdown list.

attributes.name: x-value
attributes.description: The value associated with this item. This value will be set on the select-root when the item is selected.

attributes.name: x-selected
attributes.description: When present, indicates that this item is currently selected.

attributes.name: x-disabled
attributes.description: When present, indicates that this item cannot be selected.
